### Agent Commands
Use these commands in comments to trigger the AI agent:

- `/piv full` - Run complete Plan-Implement-Verify cycle
- `/piv plan` - Create implementation plan only
- `/piv implement` - Implement from existing plan
- `/piv verify` - Run verification checks

- `/agent plan` - Quick planning assistance
- `/agent review` - Code review and analysis
- `/agent help` - Show available commands
